title: Outgoing Department
summary: Helps students find and apply for international internships.
description: The Outgoing Department assists students in discovering global internship opportunities, managing applications, and providing support throughout the entire process from application to placement.

title: Incoming Department
summary: Manages international students coming to India for internships.
description: The Incoming Department coordinates with international students, handles their accommodation, organizes cultural activities, and ensures a smooth experience during their stay in India.

title: Marketing Department
summary: Promotes IAESTE LC JECRC through various channels and events.
description: The Marketing Department is responsible for creating awareness about IAESTE programs, managing social media presence, organizing promotional events, and building the brand identity of the local committee.

title: Events Department
summary: Organizes workshops, cultural events, and networking sessions.
description: The Events Department plans and executes various activities including workshops, cultural exchange programs, networking events, and social gatherings to foster community engagement.

title: Finance Department
summary: Manages budgets, memberships, and financial operations.
description: The Finance Department handles all financial aspects including membership fees, budget planning, expense tracking, and ensuring transparent financial management of the local committee.

title: Documentation Department
summary: Assists with visa applications, paperwork, and official documentation.
description: The Documentation Department provides crucial support for visa applications, passport processing, and all necessary paperwork required for international travel and internships.

title: Technical Department
summary: Maintains website, IT infrastructure, and digital platforms.
description: The Technical Department manages the organization's digital presence, maintains the website, handles IT infrastructure, and develops tools to streamline operations and member services.

title: Public Relations Department
summary: Builds relationships with partners, sponsors, and stakeholders.
description: The Public Relations Department maintains relationships with corporate partners, educational institutions, sponsors, and alumni to support the organization's mission and growth.
